ca.uwaterloo.epad.painting

Class RectangularBristleBrush

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.SMT.PGraphicsDelegate
      • vialab.SMT.Zone
        • ca.uwaterloo.epad.ui.MoveableItem
          • ca.uwaterloo.epad.painting.Brush
            • ca.uwaterloo.epad.painting.RectangularBristleBrush
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, processing.core.PConstants

    public class RectangularBristleBrush
extends Brush
    This class simulates a rectangular hard bristle brush using a cloud of particles approach. It has two parameters: brushWidth and brushHeight.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dmitry Pyryeskin
    See Also:
    Brush, MoveableItem

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int brushHeight
      The height of the brush.
      This parameter can be retrieved automatically from XML files using SimpleMarshaller class.
      int brushWidth
      The width of the brush.
      This parameter can be retrieved automatically from XML files using SimpleMarshaller class.
